text: Colobosauroides carvalhoi is a species of lizard in the family Gymnophthalmidae. It is endemic to Northeast Brazil. ==References== Category:Colobosauroides Category:Reptiles of Brazil Category:Endemic fauna of Brazil Category:Reptiles described in 1998 Category:Taxa named by Marcelo Araújo Soares Category:Taxa named by Ulisses Caramaschi
title: Colobosauroides carvalhoi
